text: :see also: List of highest mountains This is a list of the 125 most prominent mountain peaks. Topographic prominence of a peak is the independence of the summit from whatever is around it. It is "the elevation difference between the summit and the lowest contour line encircling it and no higher summit". == List == No. Peak Range Location Prominence (m) Height (m) Col (m) Parent 1\.
